Text: Very nice movie with superstar Jackie Chan.In this movie Jackie Chan impersonates Wong Fei Hung who is sent to train with his uncle, a wine guzzling master in kung fu, famous for crippling his students. Desperate to escape this brutal teacher's cruel regime, he flees but is confronted, humiliated and beaten senseless by a hired assassin whose really name is Hwang Jang lee. Now Fei Hung is hungry for revenge, ashamed and very angry returns to his drunken master....For more information go to wing-chunws/Drunken%20Master.html
